programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter (Randy Orton) lands in a tournament where convicts fight to the death for an online audience.

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The president recruits ex-Federale Machete (Danny Trejo) to take down an eccentric arms dealer who plans to spread war and anarchy throughout the world.
A desperate man takes part in an underworld game of Russian roulette in which gamblers place bets on who will survive.

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: An ex-CIA agent (Pierce Brosnan) comes out of retirement to protect a valuable witness (Olga Kurylenko) and soon learns that now he is the target of his former friend and protege (Luke Bracey).

programme.title: Sharknado
programme.desc: A monstrous storm devastates Los Angeles, leaving the streets flooded and infested with sharks.

programme.title: The Director's Chair
programme.desc: Robert Rodriguez interviews John Carpenter about his career as a horror filmmaker.

programme.title: Fled
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Laurence Fishburne, Stephen Baldwin) fight while they evade authorities seeking a computer disk on Cuban mobsters.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: A discredited former cop connects a murder case to an elaborate conspiracy involving high-stakes treason.

programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2

programme.title: Masters of the Universe
programme.desc: Warrior He-Man (Dolph Lundgren) and his sidekicks seek a cosmic key to free a sorceress from Skeletor (Frank Langella).

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: In the central story, Dwight McCarthy (Josh Brolin) struggles with his inner demons and tries to maintain control until his former lover, Ava Lord (Eva Green), returns wanting his help to escape her abusive husband.

programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Laurence Fishburne, Stephen Baldwin) fight while they evade authorities seeking a computer disk on Cuban mobsters.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a rookie cop have to stop a master thief's computer virus before it drains all the funds from a bank's accounts.
